title: SPORT-TEK Micropique Sport-Wick Polo
description: Smooth micropique polos that wick moisture and resist snags. 3.8-ounce 100% polyester tricot Snag resistant Moisture-wicking Double-needle stitching throughout Tag-free label Taped neck Flat knit collar 3-button placket with dyed-to-match rubber buttons Set-in open hem sleeves Shoulder seam accent Side vents Due to the nature of 100% polyester performance fabrics special care must be taken throughout the screen printing process.
